            <button onclick="closePopup()" style="bottom: 1rem;" class="bg-01155A border-0 c-fff close-btn f-16 fm-SegoeUI-Bold fm-xs-SF-Pro-Display-Bold
             le1 pointer position-absolute px-3 py-0_5 r-3">ok</button>
        </div>

    </div>
</div>  
  
        <style>
.bf-popup-overlay {
    display: none;
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
    z-index: 999;
}

.bf-popup-content {
    display: none;
    position: fixed;
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
    /* width: 300px; */
    /* padding: 20px; */
    background-color: white;
    border-radius: 8px;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
    z-index: 1000;
    text-align: center;
}

.bf-close-btn {
    /* padding: 8px 16px; */

    color: #000;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 50%;

<div class="bf-popup-overlay" id="bfPopupOverlay"></div>
<div class="bf-popup-content" id="bfPopupContent">

    <img class="bf-img" src="/img/boxingDay/popupBoxingDay-en.jpg" />

<button class="bf-close-btn" id="closeBtn">X</button>

</div>

<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    const popupOverlay = document.getElementById('bfPopupOverlay');
    const popupContent = document.getElementById('bfPopupContent');
    const closeBtn = document.getElementById('closeBtn');
    localStorage.removeItem('popupDisplayed');
    if (!localStorage.getItem('popupBoxingDayDisplayed')) {
        popupOverlay.style.display = 'block';
        popupContent.style.display = 'block';
        localStorage.setItem('popupBoxingDayDisplayed', 'true');
    }

    closeBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
        popupOverlay.style.display = 'none';
        popupContent.style.display = 'none';
    });

    popupOverlay.addEventListener('click', function() {
        popupOverlay.style.display = 'none';
        popupContent.style.display = 'none';
    });

    popupContent.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
        e.stopPropagation();
    });
});
</script>

<script>
  function getClickGtag(e) {
    gtag('event', 'add_click', {
      event_label: e,
      event_value: 1
    });
  }
</script>

<script>
  function getClickGtag(e) {
    gtag('event', 'add_click', {
      event_label: e,
      event_value: 1
    });
  }
</script>

  <script>
      function addToCartBtnDcClose(add_to_cart_url, id_product){
          $('#dcLimitReached').remove();
          addToCartBtn(add_to_cart_url, id_product);
      }
      function addToCartBtnDc(add_to_cart_url, id_product){
          var lang = $('html').attr('lang');
          var url = lang == 'fr-CA' ? '/qc' : '/en'
          url += '?controller=cart&action=IsBuyDoorCrasher&ajax=1&id_product='+id_product
          showCustomLoading();
          $.ajax({
              timeout: 60 * 1000,
              url: url,
              method: 'GET',
              dataType: "json",
              success: function (response) {
                  if (response && response.isBuyDoorCrasher === true) {
                      var title = lang == 'fr-CA' ? 'Limite de Crasher de porte atteinte' : 'Door Crasher Limit Reached'
                      var text = 'Additional purchases are available at regular price with no quantity limit.';
                      if (lang == 'fr-CA') text = 'Des achats supplémentaires sont disponibles au prix régulier sans limite de quantité.'
                      var ok_text = lang == 'fr-CA' ? 'Acheter au Prix Régulier' : 'Buy at Regular Price'
                      var tpl = `<div id="dcLimitReached" class="popup-container" style="z-index:99999">
    <div
        class="bg-fff col-12 c-000 f-18 px-0 fm-xs-SF-Pro-Display-Medium popup-content">
        <div style="
     background: #F0F2F1;" class="c-000 f-18 fm-SegoeUI-Bold fm-xs-SF-Pro-Display-Bold px-1_5 py-1 position-relative">
            <span class="fm-SegoeUI-Bold fm-xs-SF-Pro-Display-Bold">` + title + `</span>
            <i onclick="$('#dcLimitReached').remove();" class="f-20 fa-solid fa-xmark pointer position-absolute r-1"></i>
        </div>
        <div style="min-height: 110px;" class="f-18 px-1_5 py-2 position-relative">
            <span  class="white-space-normal">` + text + `</span>
            <button onclick="addToCartBtnDcClose('` + add_to_cart_url + `','` + id_product + `')" style="bottom: 1rem;" class="bg-01155A border-0 c-fff close-btn f-16 fm-SegoeUI-Bold fm-xs-SF-Pro-Display-Bold
             le1 pointer position-absolute px-3 py-0_5 r-3">` + ok_text + `</button>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>`
                      $('body').prepend(tpl)
                      closeCustomLoading();
                  }else{
                      closeCustomLoading();
                      addToCartBtn(add_to_cart_url, id_product);
                  }
              },
              error: function (xhr, status, error) {
                  closeCustomLoading();
                  console.log('Error fetching data:', error);
              }
          });
      }
  </script>

    
  </div>


            

            
          </div>
        </div>
        
    </section>

    class="password-strength-feedback mt-1"

    <div class="progress-container">
      <div class="progress mb-1">
        <div class="progress-bar" role="progressbar" value="50" aria-valuemin="0" aria-valuemax="100"></div>

    <script type="text/javascript" class="js-hint-password">
              {"0":"Very weak","1":"Weak","2":"Average","3":"Strong","4":"Very strong","Straight rows of keys are easy to guess":"Straight rows of keys are easy to guess","Short keyboard patterns are easy to guess":"Short keyboard patterns are easy to guess","Use a longer keyboard pattern with more turns":"Use a longer keyboard pattern with more turns","Repeats like \"aaa\" are easy to guess":"Repeats like \"aaa\" are easy to guess","Repeats like \"abcabcabc\" are only slightly harder to guess than \"abc\"":"Repeats like \"abcabcabc\" are only slightly harder to guess than common password":"This is a very common password","This is similar to a commonly used password":"This is similar to a commonly used password","A word by itself is easy to guess":"A word by itself is           </script>
